task.title: finding the correct wage level in a labor condition application
task.shortdesc: finding the correct wage level will determine which specific wage you will use out of the foreign workers wage range for their job description and expertise level

ul.li: you must have a wage range for your foreign workers job description and expertise level
you must have access to your law firms calculative method for determining the wage level
you must have all of the required documents your specific petition requires for submission

taskbody.context: once a wage range and a wage level is found,then the exact required wage for the foreign worker can be determined

step.cmd: determine your law firms calculative method for determining a wage level
step.info: law firms may differ in the methods they use but they must meet USCIS determination standards
locate the svp range for the foreign workers job description on the given job titles home page on o*net

substep.cmd: input the years of experience required by both the employer and the o*net job description

step.info: if the numbers are equal then input a 0
if the number of years required by the employer are higher than the years required by o*net, input a number according to the numerical difference between the two
step.stepxmp: if the employer requires 3 years and o*net requires 1, then add 2 to the sum of the final number

substep.cmd: input the degree required by both the employer and the o*net job description

step.info: if the degrees are equal then input a 0
if the degrees required by the employer are higher than the years required by o*net, you will input a number according to the numerical difference between the two
step.stepxmp: if the employer requires a masters degree and o*net requires a bachelors degree, then add 1 to the sum of the final number

step.info: only add a number 1 to the sum of the final number if the foreign worker has any technical or special skills as determined by USCIS standards
only add a number 1 to the sum of the final number if the foreign worker has any supervisory duties as determined by USCIS standards

taskbody.result: the sum of the final number will determine the corresponding single digit number within the wage range for the foreign worker
